en.title: MXC in Amsterdam and Nanjing Tech Week

post.content:
## MXC in Amsterdam and Nanjing Tech Week
Aslan presented smart machine bidding at the AI & Data Expo in Amsterdam, Jeff is on his way to China and next week MXC will be at the Nanjing Tech Week. Welcome to this week’s News Update!

MXC Data Scientist Aslan Mehrabi presented MXC, MXProtocol, and Smart Machine Bidding at the AI & Big Data Expo in Amsterdam last week. His presentation filled the house, and lead to a number of positive discussions regarding the MXC-driven machine-to-machine payment process.

Jeff left yesterday for China! At 14:15 CEST Jeff “the MXC Guy” boarded a jet plane headed for Nanjing. He was extremely excited to be traveling to China for his first visit. While he is there he will present MXC during the Nanjing Tech Week and visit Shanghai to check on the progress of the Shanghai Yangpu District integration.

This has been this week’s news update. I look forward to speaking with all of you again next week. Until then, get active, get in the community, as us questions — because it’s only together that we can build the Future of IoT.
post.metaDescription: MXC Data Scientist Aslan Mehrabi presented at AI & Big Data Expo in Amsterdam. MXC will also be presenting at Nanjing Tech Week.

post.slug: mxc极域本周在阿姆斯特丹以及南京科技周

hans.title: MXC极域本周在阿姆斯特丹以及南京科技周

post.content:
## MXC极域本周在阿姆斯特丹以及南京科技周

Aslan在阿姆斯特丹的AI大数据博览会上展示了智慧物联竞价，Jeff正在前往中国，将于下周代表MXC极域参加南京科技周。 欢迎来到本周的新闻更新！

MXC极域数据科学家Aslan Mehrabi，上周在阿姆斯特丹的AI大数据博览会上介绍了MXC极域，MXC极域协议和智慧物联竞价。 他的演讲使当时的会场气氛十分的活跃，并就MXC极域物联网共识问题的流程进行了一些积极的讨论。

Jeff在昨天前往中国啦！ 他于柏林时间下午2点15分登上了一架前往中国的航班！ 他对第一次来中国感到非常兴奋。 当他在那里时，他将在南京科技周期间代表MXC极域，并访问上海，了解上海杨浦区一体化的进展情况。

这就是本周的新闻更新啦。 我很期待下周再跟你们聊聊。 在那之前，变得积极吧、加入我们的社群、问我们问题。因为只有我们在一起，我们才能建造物联网的未来。
post.metaDescription: Aslan在阿姆斯特丹的AI大数据博览会上展示了智慧物联竞价，Jeff正在前往中国，将于下周代表MXC极域参加南京科技周。 欢迎来到本周的新闻更新！
